name: it's always monday
description: it's always monday - is a first person exploration game
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 10 Processor: Dual core 2.0 ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: last 4 years Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 10 Processor: Quad core 2.0 ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 9xx series Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I don't typically do reviews, but I went into this game thinking it would actually be something decent. Boy was I wrong. Maybe I'm missing some kind of big joke with this, but I played expecting it to actually be semi-insightful and instead was greeted by total BS. The concept of the game is actually mildy interesting, but the ending is just plain stupid.  Had potential. Did not deliver. 2/10
This game is so short but good
No gameplay, banal story. It's like to get a nothing for free.
Really nice little game if you hate having fun or if you're just sadistic in general
Very emotionally saddening game, but well made. Great game if you have 15 minutes on hand and you want to finish a game start to finish.

It's always monday and for some reason I'm always walking backwards! havn't seen any other comments with this issue but for me it made the game unplayable.  Apart from that didnt seem to bad for a freebie.

This game was ok. I wish there were more ways you could interact with everything and different places you could go in the office and such, but it was ok for a free walking sim. You could get this and explore the office and do everything to make the 5 days go by. It's not a bad experience.
